5/104. Tha Bing ag adhbharachadh ùpraid 's e fhèin 's Sula a' biadhadh nan tunnagan. Bing causes chaos when he and Sula go to feed the ducks.
6/104. Tha an curran aig Bing a tuiteam dhan sùghmils'-banana a tha e fhèin 's Flop ag ullachadh. Bing's carrot falls into the banana smoothie that he and Flop are making.

programmes.show_name: 'S E Iasg a Th'Annam (I'm a Fish)
programmes.show_description: 51/52. Tha Cearban-gearraidh ag innse dhuinn mu dhèidhinn fhèin an-diugh. A Cookie Cutter Shark tells us all about himself today.

3/26. Petit has a loose tooth and is not willing to hand it to the tooth mouse at any cost!

6/13. Tha Fionn a' feuchainn ri athair a stad is tha e feumach air taic bho Na Neachdan. Fionn is trying to stop his father and needs help from the Neachdan family.
1/6. Bliadhna sgoile ùr agus èiginn ùr aig Sgoil Taobh na Cloiche. A new school year and new crisis at Sgoil Taobh na Cloiche.
1/2. Calum Dòmhnallach le taghadh de na còig criomagan a b' fheàrr a chòrd ris fhèin. Calum Macdonald introduces a selection of his favourite facts.
...Ploc/The Rubbish World of Dave Spud. 40/52. The Spuds join Betty on a work trip across America. Will a surprising body swap help their American dreams come true?

2/3. Hitler's establishment of a totalitarian dictatorship after becoming Reich chancellor. Contains some scenes which some viewers may find upsetting.
